name: Freetrader letter of marque
desc: Captains holding a letter of marque issued by CFT are granted a ship modification package that lowers sensor profile by %s ,increased sensor gathering by %s and increases cargo capacity by %s

name: Combat Engineers
desc: Combat Engineers repair %s of their armor and hull damage after battle to the ship they crew. They reduce most negative effects of d-mods by %s and their skill gives them a %s chance to avoid new d-mods. Additionally any ship they are assigned to are almost always recoverable after the battle.
short: Combat engineers specialize in  hull repair and recovery.
